participant_1.background:
I'm single and focused on my career.
my favorite tv show is friends.
my favorite food is raw onion.
I secretly watch wrestling to take my mind off the stress of running my juicing bar.
i work as a veterinarians assistant.

participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
I spend time with my mom and my dog and enjoy a little gossip.
I love sushi because it reminds me of the ocean, where my beta fish lives.
i like fitness.
My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa.

content.text: Hello there!  How's your day going?
It's going well! I got a new job as a veterinarian assistant and I'm really excited about it.
That's awesome! Congratulations! I bet that's a really rewarding job.
It is, I get to help animals every day! What do you do for work?
I design jewelry. I love the feeling of creating something beautiful.
That's so cool! I love jewelry, I'm always on the lookout for new pieces.
Thanks! I have a small business so I can make jewelry that I like and that my customers will love.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're very talented.
Thanks, I appreciate that! I love what I do.
Well, I'm going to have to go now, but it was nice chatting with you!
You too! Have a great day!
